title: Reflect Function
description: This function calculates a reflection of a given DWORD value by shifting its bits and combines it with the original value using bitwise operations.
name: REFLECT

input.name: D
input.description: The DWORD value to be reflected.

input.name: L
input.description: The length defining how many bits to reflect from the DWORD value.

output.name: REFLECT
output.description: The resulting DWORD value after the reflection operation.

return_value.description: The resulting DWORD value from the reflection process.
